description.value: Besides serving as a hooded lantern with a radius of 60 feet of bright light and another 60 feet of dim light, when directed at an illusion as part of a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Seek} action, make a level 3 counteract check with the @Check[perception] of the holder of the lamp. On a success, the illusion fades away so long it remains in the bright light of the lamp, becoming easily ignored. They create this item from a living guiding light after it passes on. How it was obtained is known to other guiding lights that see it, and may influence their starting dispositions.
The nature of this object is unclear.
